item.title: SLU ğŸ” Lumen Field Loop
item.description: Route Description Starting at South Lake Union, I walked south towards Pike Place Market, enjoying the vibrant atmosphere and scenic views of the waterfront. Passing by the market’s bustling stalls and iconic fish-throwing vendors, I continued down to the pier, where the fresh sea breeze and views of Elliott Bay were refreshing. From there, I headed towards Lumen Field, taking in the sight of the impressive stadium. After reaching Lumen Field, I turned back and made my way through the heart of downtown Seattle.
